Uses of Class
edu.cmu.cs.ark.sage.features.Feature

  • Packages that use Feature 
    Package Description
    edu.cmu.cs.ark.sage
    Main class for implementation of SAGE.
    edu.cmu.cs.ark.sage.features
    Classes that are used to represent observable features of documents.

      Returns the unmodifiable list of features that SAGE knows of.

      void SAGE.addFeature(Feature feature)
      Adds a Feature to SAGE.
      double SAGE.featureProbability(EffectSet es, Feature feature)
      Returns the probability of feature being generated by the set of effects es, i.e p(feature | es).
      double SAGE.featureProbability(int es_index, Feature feature)
      See SAGE.featureProbability(EffectSet, Feature).
      int SAGE.findFeature(Feature f)
      Finds a feature in SAGE.
      void SAGE.incrementFeatureCount(EffectSet e, Feature f, double count)
      Adds count of Feature f to EffectSet e.
      void SAGE.incrementFeatureCount(int es_index, Feature f, double count)
      See SAGE.incrementFeatureCount(EffectSet, Feature, double).
      double SAGE.logFeatureProbability(EffectSet es, Feature feature)
      Same as SAGE.featureProbability(EffectSet, Feature) but returns the log instead.
      double SAGE.logFeatureProbability(int es_index, Feature feature)
      See SAGE.logFeatureProbability(EffectSet, Feature)
      void SAGE.setFeatureCount(EffectSet e, Feature f, double count)
      Set the feature count for a specific EffectSet and Feature.
